sample.account.controller

Class BankAccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.account.controller.BankAccountController

  • @RestController
public class BankAccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    Restful webservice controller for serving client requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BankAccountController() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BankAccountNumber getNewAccount()
      Creates new random account number for demo-purposes: does not handle for example bank office number information etc.
      BankAccountNumber validate(java.lang.String accountNumber)
      Validates given (PathVariable) accountNumber Validity information is included in BankAccountNumber domain object.

    • Method Detail

      • getNewAccount

        @RequestMapping(value="/newaccount")
public BankAccountNumber getNewAccount()
        Creates new random account number for demo-purposes: does not handle for example bank office number information etc. Example request from same host: http://localhost:8080/newaccount
        Returns:
        BankAccountNumber domain object JSON presentation

      • validate

        @RequestMapping(value="/validate/{accountNumber}")
public BankAccountNumber validate(@PathVariable
                                        java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Validates given (PathVariable) accountNumber Validity information is included in BankAccountNumber domain object. Example request from same host: http://localhost:8080/validate/123456-987654
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - PathVariable in text or long format
        Returns:
        BankAccountNumber domain object JSON presentation
